Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
to say yes to a suggestion or ideaagreeI suggested they seek legal counsel and they agreed.acceptI have no choice but to accept the ruling of the court.acquiesceThe police acquiesced to the rebels' demands.assentBy signing, you assent to the terms of the contract.consentI consent to a search of my vehicle.
